item.title: Irina add a quote by Ionel Teodoreanu
item.description: "Cand afirma nu crede: cand crede, nu spune; iar cand tace, minte." -- Ionel Teodoreanu

item.title: Irina add a quote by Ionel Teodoreanu
item.description: "Trufia de a iubi, de-a te sti vast, acoperit de uralele multimilor din tine. In tine ca un cer de august in ploaia lui de stele." -- Ionel Teodoreanu

item.title: Irina add a quote by Nicolae Steinhardt
Irina add a quote by Mihai Eminescu
item.description: "Numai daca vremea ar sta locului am putea vedea lamurit ce este etern" -- Mihai Eminescu

item.title: Irina add a quote by Graham Greene
item.description: "Eternitatea nu este o prelungire a timpului ci o absenta a lui." -- Graham Greene

item.title: Irina add a quote by Ionel Teodoreanu
item.description: "un zambet- venea din soare, din vant, fara gand, fara vorbe, fara scop" -- Ionel Teodoreanu

item.title: Irina add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Irina add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Irina add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "I envy you your peace of mind, your clean conscience, your unpolluted memory. Little girl, a memory without blot of contamination must be an exquisite treasure-an inexhaustible source of pure refreshment: is it not?" -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Irina add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Never travel faster than your guardian angel can fly." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Irina add a quote by Kent M. Keith
item.description: "The good you do today may be forgotten tomorrow. Do good anyway." -- Kent M. Keith

item.title: Irina add a quote by Rudyard Kipling
item.description: "Words are, of course, the most powerful drug used by mankind." -- Rudyard Kipling

item.title: Irina add a quote by Ted Hughes
item.description: "The only calibration that counts is how much heart people invest, how much they ignore their fears of being hurt or caught out or humiliated. And the only thing people regret is that they didn't live boldly enough, that they didn't invest enough heart, didn't love enough. Nothing else really counts at all." -- Ted Hughes

item.title: Irina add a quote by W. Somerset Maugham
item.description: "There are three rules for writing a novel. Unfortunately, no one knows what they are." -- W. Somerset Maugham

item.title: Irina add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I am not sure that I exist, actually. I am all the writers that I have read, all the people that I have met, all the women that I have loved; all the cities I have visited." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Irina add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Irina add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "What's the good of living if you don't try a few things?" -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Irina add a quote by Arthur Schopenhauer
item.description: "Talent hits a target no one else can hit. Genius hits a target no one else can see." -- Arthur Schopenhauer

item.title: Irina add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost
